page.title: 20ONGAR AFTERTHOUGHTS
page.content: Ongar,for the size of town it is,has a varied range of activities.Although Ongar has 6000 inhabitants, Chipping Ongar only has 1800. Ongar is made up of four areas which are called Marden Ash, Chipping Ongar, Shelley and High Ongar. Most people in Ongar agreed that there should be better shopping facilities. Others said a park or play area for younger children and for older people to sit would be a good idea. Although Ongar has two car parks and other areas for parking some people still wanted more parking space.
